text: @SpeakerPelosi Are you completely crazy? YOU, @RepAdamSchiff, @SenateDems @HouseDemocrats had the President, GOP, the people and media tied up with you ridiculous impeachment hoax wasting all of our time and MILLIONS of dollars instead of starting to see Coronavirus was coming. Blame yourself!
